Text: This desire for anti-establishment politics is coupled with a heavy reliance on social media for news in Tunisia. By 2012, over 60 percent of Tunisians relied on Facebook rather than the traditional media for their daily news.
Cause: This desire for anti-establishment politics is coupled with a heavy reliance on social media for news in Tunisia.
Effect: By 2012, over 60 percent of Tunisians relied on Facebook rather than the traditional media for their daily news.
Sentence: <e1>This desire for anti-establishment politics is coupled with a heavy reliance on social media for news in Tunisia.</e1> <e2>By 2012, over 60 percent of Tunisians relied on Facebook rather than the traditional media for their daily news.</e2>
